name: Task 005: Demo Manipulator Arms in ROS1
description: Integration-level benchmark task for selecting and executing manipulator demos using Interbotix ROS1 packages.

subtasks.name: Configure control launch
subtasks.expected_outcome: Control node launches with correct robot model and SDK type.

subtasks.name: Configure MoveIt execution mode
subtasks.expected_outcome: MoveIt nodes launch in selected mode: gazebo, actual, or fake.

subtasks.name: Configure interface
subtasks.expected_outcome: Selected interface (C++, Python, GUI) launches successfully.
